The number of samples analysed using various serological assays for HeV, NiV and LBV is shown in Table 1. Antibodies against LBV (LBV.NIG56-RV1) were detected using a mFAVN assay
37 , using the LBVNig56 isolate. Samples were tested in duplicate using threefold serial dilutions and titres corresponding to 100% neutralisation of virus input are reported as IC100 endpoint reciprocal dilutions and were considered positive at > 1:9.
